thumb.title: Not Quite After Midnight Very Special Episode w_Richard Blank - 2023_12_14
thumb.description: Not Quite After Midnight Podcast interview with Richard Blank. CEO call center Costa Rica.Richard is an Interpersonal Communication Conflict Management Strategist and has the largest collection of American pinball machines in Central America. He is also CEO of Costa Rica's Call Center, the best one there is. Check out the website for Costa Rica's Call Center: https://costaricascallcenter.com.Be sure to listen in and share the show with others who might enjoy or benefit from it.The show is also available on Facebook and all the major podcasting platforms.Enjoy.https://youtu.be/mvUa8fLuv9khttps://youtu.be/DvQOfvPrpTghttps://youtu.be/8BgvA-3mnbchttps://youtu.be/l8o_8hl5fXQhttps://youtu.be/1f1dVEf7TNo
